SEARCH
Package HWSystem.Device.MotorDriver

Class MotorDriver

java.lang.Object
HWSystem.Device.Device
HWSystem.Device.MotorDriver.MotorDriver
Direct Known Subclasses:
PCA9685, SparkFunMD
public abstract class MotorDriver extends Device
Abstract class for motor driver devices in the system.

A MotorDriver is a type of Device that controls a motor and keeps track of its speed. Subclasses must implement the setMotorSpeed(int) method to define how the motor speed is set.

Each motor driver is linked to a specific communication protocol (e.g., UART, SPI). The motor's current speed is tracked with currentSpeed.
